author: fitz
msg: Bring svnlook into 2004.
* doc/book/book/ch09.xml: Finish updating svnlook documentation.

author: dlr
msg: * Makefile.in
(INSTALL_EXTRA_JAVAHL_LIB): As a followup to r9048, adjust definition of
INSTALL_EXTRA_JAVAHL_LIB so that XEmacs does not complain about a
"suspicious line" when I try to save this file.
build-outputs.mk's use of INSTALL_EXTRA_JAVAHL_LIB already
includes the leading tab character, so removal of it in this
symbol's definition is safe.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Make javahl-tests target conditional upon --with-junit option.
* configure.in: Export JAVAHL_TESTS_TARGET if --with-junit specified.
* Makefile.in: Use JAVAHL_TESTS_TARGET instead of hardcoding javahl-tests.

author: jerenkrantz
msg: Add in logic to build javahl test cases with 'check-javahl' target.
Add --with-junit configure option to locate junit.jar file.
* build.conf: (javahl-tests) Add Java junit test targets.
* configure.in: Add in logic to detect Darwin platforms that need the
libsvnjavahl-1.dylib installed as .jnilib; add --with-junit option exported
via JAVA_CLASSPATH variable.
* build/ac-macros/java.m4 (SVN_FIND_JDK): Export location of 'java' binary.
* build/generator/gen_make.py (write): Always add -classpath and allow
target-specific CLASSPATH variable.
* subversion/bindings/java/javahl/src/org/tigris/subversion/javahl/tests/BasicTests.java
(suite, main): Allow test case to be run by junit.
* Makefile.in: Add in special install target for install-javahl-lib;
export classpath for javahl-java and javahl-tests compile; add javahl-tests
target (builds test cases) and check-javahl (runs junit cases).

author: maxb
msg: Typo fix.
Approved by dionisos.
* subversion/libsvn_fs/dag.h (svn_fs__dag_remove_node): Fix typo in comment.
